DOC.brief_summary: Zinc supplementation effect on appetite and growth of malnourished children
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Zinc Supplementation on Appetite and Growth in Primary Malnourished Children
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators will do s. Zinc and letting before and after zinc supplementation
DOC.criteria: primary malnourished zinc supplementation in the previous 3 months Children with chronic disease
